message: Damn, I mean "consuming media" and not "consumer media"
hmm.. maybe something that can aggregate all the "feed-able" items, like combining an RSS feeder with twitter and other updating sites? maybe...
you mean like flipboard or paper.li? yeah, i think there's a market for it. but to rephrase rsarver on twitter (http://twitter.com/rsarver/status/47370374400323584), don't bet on it as a business...
